name: Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Pure Vanilla, Cotton Candy, Coconut Milk..Fragrance Description:Boardwalk Delight is a sweet and warm gourmand scent that ushers in nostalgic memories with notes of cotton candy, vanilla, and coconut milk. Stroll down the sunny boardwalk with a treat in hand and wait for the joys of your youth to bubble up from within..About the Bottle:This bottle was created to mimic a cloud's organic shape in the sky. It represents the beauty of imperfection and celebration of each person's unique qualities. With its beautiful square design, it sits comfortably in the palm of your hand and elegantly on your vanity or tabletop..About the Fragrance:SKYLAR was founded by u2018mompreneuru2019 Cat Chen after her daughteru2019s allergic reaction to her perfume. SKYLAR fragrances are hypoallergenic, safe for sensitive skin, cruelty-free, vegan, and inspired by the natural landscapes of SKYLARu2019s hometown, Los Angeles.
ingredients: Organic Sugar Cane Alcohol Denat., Parfum/fragrance, Agrumex, Ambrofix, Benzaldehyde, Bicyclo Nonalacto, Cosmone, Cyclamen Aldehyde, Damascone Alpha, Dihydro Myrcenol, Dimethyl Benzyl Carbinyl Butyrate, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethyl Alcohol. Ethyl Linalool, Ethyl Maltol, Ethyl Methyl-2-Butyrate, Ethyl Vanillin, Florocyclene, Florosa, Habanolide, Hedione, Heliotropine, Helvetolide, Hexenol-3-Cis, Homofuronol, Jasmacyclene, Lemonile, Maltol, Octalactone Gamma, Osyrol, Phenoxy Ethyl Isobutyrate, Raspberry Ketone, Serenolide, Triethyl Citrate, Vanillin, Vanillin Isobutyrate, Velvione,  Aqua/Water/Eau......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply your fragrance to major pulse points such as your wrists, neck, and below the ears. .-Be sure to tap your wrists together (donu2019t rub) to help make the scent last longer..-Layer multiple SKYLAR fragrances together to create different possibilities and give your fragrance maximum impact...Recycling Instructions:.-This box, bottle, and cap are fully recyclable. .-When the bottle is empty, remove cap and pump and wash thoroughly. .-Recycle the bottle and cap and place pump in the trash.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla milkshakes, coconut whipped cream etc.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a promenade walk kind of Kween and this perfume make me feel like Iu2019m walking straight into a yummy fantasy. This fantasy is filled with vanilla milkshakes, coconut whipped cream, cotton candy, and freshness! I feel clean but yet seen and definitely heard!

reviews.review_title: If you like sweet then this is for you

reviews.review_text: It is nice but not my scent type at all. This is a VERY sweet ice cream scent but with a little fresh tones. It reminds me of fantasy by BS and Katy Perry meow perfume. It also gave me a headache

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Initially avoided trying because I didn't want that strong, sickly sweet (but accurate) candy floss scent that I smelled with Le Monde Gourmand's Sucre de Cotton. This is very soft. Not so much candy floss, more milk bottle lollies if you've ever eaten those. On me there is no dry down, it's milk bottle then it's gone. I don't smell any other notes other than the candy floss, vanilla, and coconut. The longevity (10 seconds) and sillage (hugs only) sucks but this is so lovely and lightly sweet that I don't mind. I'll sample the spray next to see if it's any different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Wish it lasted longer! Smells just like that new Kayali Boujee perfume.

reviews.review_title: It's okay, smells very soapy smelling though.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to try this perfume because I love the smell of the plain vanilla version and was excited to have that sweetness of cotton candy, but was a little disappointed.  It smells good, definitely not bad, but smells very soapy to me. Like a lightly cotton candy scented hand soap.  I dont get any hints of vanilla, really at all, which is unfortunate. I definitely dont get any coconut smell at all. All I get is the cotton candy smell, but it is too mild in general.  I was so excited to try it, but I feel a little disappointed in the smell. It just smells like sweet soap.  I will still use it, as the smell is nice, not gross by any means, but just not what I was hoping for.  I wouldn't repurchase, and I feel like the smell is lacking strength.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, i like it better than pink sugar. Theyu2019re totally diff scents though. But Skylaru2019s is a much better accurate smell of cotton candy. My rollerball was fine, smells just as strong as the bigger bottle. Not sure whatu2019s going on with others, Iu2019d prefer a travel size spray of course but itu2019s not that big of a deal. As you can see from my perfumes I tend to like sweeter scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was nothing special.  Smelled like Warm Vanilla Sugar from BBW.  Also, the scent didn't last.  I usually don't purchase rollerballs and only purchase travel sprays, since scents don't seem to be that strong when in rollarball packaging, but I tried this in the rollerball and found that I couldn't smell it on me at all, and was only able to smell it on me for about an hour.  Too bad Skylar doesn't offer travel sprays instead of rollerballs.

reviews.review_title: This smells exactly like VS Cotton Candy Body Mist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells exactly like Victoria's Secret Cotton Candy body mist (except this lasts waaay longer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The second I smelt this perfume, I fell in love. It's just the right amount of sweet, and it stays on me for quite a while. It's everything I've ever wanted in any perfumes I've smelt in forever. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are 2 reasons I am giving this only 3 stars. The First is because it DOESN'T LAST PAST 5 MINUTES. I can't smell it AT ALL. The second reason Is because it's a Roller Ball not a spray. Big thumbs down for me and I was super excited for this too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your a gourmand lover this is a safe blind purchase. I loved it and it was a blind purchase. It smells like real cotton candy. Not synthetic but real cotton candy. The coconut blends on perfectly. For a clean scent it lasts 4-5 hours which is standard. The bottle is pretty as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, I plan to buy the full size.  I knocked off a star solely for it being a roller ball applicator.     This scent overall is fluffy, cozy, and sweet.  I love the coconut milk, and cotton candy with the slight beachy salt air.  It's almost refreshing, and then settles on the skin in a fluffy sweet way.    I especially love this for layering, and use it with a coconut based body mist. I also love to wear this scent to bed.  Now I just need to finish the roller ball, so I can move on to the spray version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very much hit or missu2026 most likely due to the fact itu2019s a rollerballu2026 but sometimes on my skin it smells like bathroom soapu2026. Then other times it smells delicious so take that with what you will ud83eudd37u200du2640ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin

When I started loving it is when I paired it with the new sdj green summer scent which is a clean coconut smell. These two scents paired with pink sugar for that extra little cotton candy sweetness is heavenly and my current go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very sweet, but has 0 projection and last 30 minutes on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In LOVE with this perfume. Smells so sweet and creamy. This perfume will be a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_title: Si seulement l'odeur restait plus que 5 minutes...
reviews.review_text: J'ai achete ce parfum car j'adorais l'odeur gourmande de la barbapapa vanille l'egerement fruite. Malheureusement, j'ai eu beau m'asperger outrageusement, apres 5 minutes, il ne restait qu'une faible odeur qui n'etait pas comparable u00e0 celle du depart et qui etait u00e0 peine perceptible. Et ne me dites pas que c'est du u00e0 la chimie de ma peau car j'en ai mis dans mes cheveux ainsi que sur mes vu00eatements! Alors la blague a assez dure, certain parfum ne tienne tout simplement pas sur quoi que ce soit et ne projette pas du tout! La mu00eame journee j'avais mis une seule vaporisation d'un autre parfum dans la boutique Sephora sur le dessus de ma main droite et cette odeur u00e0 perdure jusqu'u00e0 la fin de la journee.   J'ai bien su00fbr retourner u00e0 la bouteille de parfum au Sephora sur la rue Sainte-Catherine et comme d'habitude, en boutique on veut savoir pourquoi je le retourne et ensuite la caissiere tente de trouver une raison u00e0 donner mu00eame si je n'en ai aucunement besoin. Cette fois elle m'a dit que les parfums qui avaient la mention Clean avaient une moins bonne tenue que les autres. J'ai pourtant deju00e0 teste deux autres parfums de cette marque qui sont aussi Clean, et pourtant l'odeur tenait beaucoup plus longtemps, et on sentais le parfum pendant plus d'une heure!   Une mu00eame marque peut faire des parfums qui ont une excellente tenue alors que d'autres auront une tenu digne d'une bruine pour le corps bon marche. C'est le cas ici.

reviews.review_title: Smells great but doesn't last long
reviews.review_text: Smells great but does not last long unless I spray a lot of it. And for the price, I don't want to have to use so much for just one day. So I just wish it was a stronger scent.

The only reason it's not a solid 5 stars is because my rollerball sucks and seems to not really pick up any perfume. I have to roll it at least 15 times to get even a small amount out so I'll definitely be grabbing a larger size soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: If you want to pay big money to smell cheapu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is absolutely amazing it so fresh and clean I am absolutely obsessed. It has vanilla and then cotton candy which combined smells like heaven. Clean girl fragrance for sure!!  Will have your guy all over you wink!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is delicious; I mean it literally smells like cotton candy. Definitely one of my favorites especially for the summertime. I wore this on the santa monica boardwalk and it was such a vibe. 4 stars for moderate longevity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the full-size bottle in-store to demo this scent and personally loved the mix of warm vanilla with sweet notes of cotton candy. I was even more impressed when the scent lasted hours before gently fading away. I ended up purchasing the rollerball version to trial for a few weeks before investing $120 for a full-size bottle. Total waste of money. Scent was undetecable an hour after application. Reapplied several times throughout the day - same results, scent was done an hour later.  Completely different experience using the rollerball vs. a full size bottle, which I'd love to buy, but it's always sold out on-line and in-store. Going to return the rollerball and wait for a full-size restock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so bummed that this isnu2019t working out on my skin! I love the way it smells out of the bottle, but on me it goes so soapy! Iu2019m definitely going to use it up, but itu2019s not my favorite on my skin. I hope that it works better on other people though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in store before purchasing and loved it way more than I was expecting to! It is sweet and soft, and reminds me of warm summer evenings in my hometown- strolling down the waterfront and smelling the ice cream and waffle cones from the little shops. The dry down is perfect- not too intense of a scent, but enough you notice it. Longevity for me was pretty good with this scent. It is nice to have a summer scent that isn't super fruity or citrusy.  I see a few people who say it smells like public washroom hand soap, and while I do not get that on my skin, I can see how there is a bit of a clean tone to this that may not work for everyone. I definitely pick up the cotton candy in this more than anything.   For reference, some of my other favourite scents are Prada Candy, Kayali Yum, and Killian Princess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for this as I was told it was so amazing and sweet. Reminded me of the cheap body spray for kids I just couldnu2019t stand it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I blind-bought this because it wasnu2019t in stock at my nearby Sephora to smell. Was excited for a grown-up cotton candy scent, but it smells like a porta-potty to me so needless to say itu2019s going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingggggg perfume!!! Definitely my favorite from Skylar. Smells very nostalgic to me, reminds me of beach vacations and evenings on the boardwalk eating ice cream and cotton candy when I was little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like cotton candy and itu2019s delectable! It stays on your skin and will last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its very sweet. It smells good in the bottle but on my skin it turns tart :/ im not sure whats going on but it doesnt smell good. I actually prefer VS pink Warm and cozy over this. Its good but not for me. I actually like their peach scent better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this scent and it lasts so long on my skin, just wish it came in a lotion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been debating getting this one for a while, finally did, and it's perfect! I like to smell like sweets and this definitely fits the bill! The initial scent is very sugary and bright (top notes listed include apple and raspberry sorbet) but after a little bit it settles into mostly vanilla with hints of sugar and coconut for me. This is going to give my go to summer perfume a run for its money this year! I do think it's not a very in your face scent, some people mentioned it wearing off quickly but I don't think that's the case, it's just not too strong. I get migraines from strong scents and I think it's perfect. You could wear it to the office without offending everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to assume this smells like cheap public bathroom soap because it's a roller ball. If you don't mind stinking for an hour then a faint sweet if you smash your nose to your arm, then it's for you.  Note to Skylar...NO roller balls!!  It was the same price as perfume with a sprayer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Skylar told me it wasnu2019t their problem because I bought it at Sephora so that says enough about the company

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sweet smell, perfect for summer! Cotton candy, coco milk and vanilla all combined in one is honestly a perfect match I got told so many times about how good I smell I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

After just a few mins of wearing a couple of sprays, it fades immensely and I have to bring my wrist right up to my nose to be able to smell it. It smells like a more nuanced take on cotton candyu2014it almost reminds me of the u201cscent machinesu201d (not sure what theyu2019re actually called) at Disney or at carnivals. I am a bit concerned about how difficult it is to remove the capu2026with my luck Iu2019m gonna end up accidentally throwing the bottle across the room and smashing it.

reviews.review_text: Smells divine ! Opens up with like a fresh cotton candy laundry scent & then dries down to like the perfect ice cream shop vanilla vibes ! Just beautiful

reviews.review_title: Reminds me of a midway at fair

reviews.review_text: Reminds me of my teenage years when I used to go to our country fair, itu2019s one of the best! Smells like the midway. My friend was with me and she said it smelled like fruit loops with milk LOL. I actually purchased it because I am a collector and I think itu2019s fun to have and will be wearing it in the summer months!

I love sweet and gourmand perfumes, my favourite one being the Crybaby by Melanie Martinez. This smells soooo heavenly, like cotton candy vanilla but not like a childu2019s smell. I get compliments non stop when I wear it. Will keep purchasing for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

This scent gives complex cotton candy! The scent reminds me of those scented cupcake dolls from my childhood (early 90's).  it's definitely a spring/summer scent and I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Fresh and Light! For the non sweet scent lovers!

reviews.review_title: Such a light but beautiful scent

reviews.review_text: This scent reminds me of when I first went to Disneyland brought back so many beautiful memories. Absolutely love it and I can not stop smelling myself itu2019s just so good. Definitely try before buying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this perfume! The key notes really come through. I can definitely smell the vanilla and the coconut milk. Itu2019s very gourmand and very warm but perfect for warmer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

This smells absolutely amazing and delicious, seriously an amazing scent that is literally gorgeous. Itu2019s light and fresh but also sweet and warm. Obsessed.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s giving Bath & Body works body mist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

One of the girls gave me a few other options to try as well, this being one of them. I was completely obsessed and in love. The longevity of the scent is pretty average considering itu2019s a lighter scent and the wear down gives a beautiful vanilla coconut. Definitely going to buy the full bottle because I cannot stop smelling it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is perfect! The scent is a perfect mix between fresh and sweet! Itu2019s not overbearing or syrupy sweet, I def recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this perfume! My husband really loves it on me too so I'm happy! Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_title: Pink Skies from Bath and Body Works

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: is it just me, or does the rollerball/travel size smell ENTIRELY different than the full size?  the travel size smells dusty, musty, almost like wet newspaper or the stuff you tip out of a vacuum cleaner cannister? no coconut, no cotton candy, no vanilla. no sweetness whatsoever.  lasting power is horrible, which is almost a bonus, considering how dusty and unpleasant this smells.

reviews.review_title: Love it hate it smell is good tho

After trying it out for a few days I ended up really liking the smell. However, the lasting power is absolute crap! I get maybe 3 hours tops out t of it which really sucks since I commutes to the full size bottle. I decided to keep it though. I like to wear the Madagascar vanilla perfume oil by Nest with it and that definitely helps the lasting power and you will smell like a yummy vanilla sugar cookie with coconut cream icing with that mix!

I expected a lot from this scent. I received the travel size and the roll-on application makes it greasy on the skin. Smells of cotton candy and vanilla but I expected more. Doesn't last very long. Maybe in spray it would last longer? I will not keep it I will return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Boardwalk Delight  This is a sweet scent that's not too overpowering. The cotton candy and vanilla notes are more obvious. I can barely smell the coconut milk note. It's a nice, light scent that's perfect for summer days. It lasts most of the day on me when applied to my pulse points and is great for layering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Boardwalk Delight rollerball as a free sample. I like the scent of this product. It has a soft, sweet smell. It does remind me of cotton candy. I like the rollerball. The rollerball makes it easy to use and carry in your purse. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum from SKYLAR is a very light and fun fragrance.  I love that it is safe or sensitive skin, hypoallergenic, and made in an eco-friendly way.  The scent itself is sweet and somewhat strong, lasting quite a while on my skin.  I most notice the cotton candy note, followed by the vanilla, with just a hint of the coconut milk on the finish.  The bottle is quite pretty and the rollerball deposits a good amount of perfume with only a gentle swipe.  I love that the ball itself is metal, as it feels slightly cool on my skin.  If you are looking for a lovely sweet scent, try out Boardwalk Delight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nostalgia as soon as I smelled it! If you like sweet smells then this would be perfect for you. Long lasting also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the SKYLAR Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum Rollerball and while normally I am not a huge fan of fragrances that smell sweet (like candy or dessert), I like this scent. I like that it is not too strong or overbearing and I think it helps that it has other notes in it (pure vanilla and coconut milk) so it helps it to not just smell like cotton candy. I think the vanilla in it helps me to like it as I have other frangrance products with vanilla in it. I love the rollarball itself as it applies easy and I can control the amount I get. I do feel that while it does last a decent amount of time, it definitely doesn't last all day (or at least isn't strong by the end of the day).   Overall it is something I would continue to use in the future and while I was expecting to not care for it at all since I'm usually a big fan of floral scents, this is a sweet scent I do actually like.
I like the light scent of cotton candy and vanilla. I like the easy to use roller ball.

reviews.review_title: Such a light, fresh, sweet vanilla candy scent!
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a sweet vanilla cotton candy-like scent and this is soo good. I blind bought the rollerball and I can't stop smelling it. It's very sweet. At first you smell the vanilla and cotton candy notes behind it, and then you get this subtle airy linen/clean laundry scent. It's not as warm as just a pure vanilla because of that linen note which gives it a bit of lightness to it. I think this could layer really well with any sweet, warm, or vanilla scents. Perfect summer fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good fragrance from skylar. I got this product for testing and I absolutely loved it. It has a very soothing vanilla note with a very clean afternote. Anyone who likes a subtle and clean fragrance should try it.

reviews.review_title: Sweet scent lovers, this is for YOU!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It's not at all overpowering and everyone asks me what I'm wearing. The roller ball tip applies just the right amount in a short swipe and allows it to glide on effortlessly. The scent goes well with everything. Light and lovely are what this scent is all about.

reviews.review_title: A new daily perfume for me!

I tried 3xs the more I rolled the more the cotton candy bubble gum smell I was getting. This was a great blind buy for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! This is exactly what the notes say: Cotton Candy, Vanilla & Coconut Milk. Fun, cozy, flirty, sweet, soft but yet powerful. The colors on the bottle is exactly what you think of when you smell it. If you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

Itu2019s fruity due to the fragrance notes of vanilla, cotton candy, and coconut milk. The rollerball is good for carrying on the go for reapplying throughout the day - scent fades fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love how sweet this fragrance is! It reminds me of a cheap Walgreens cotton candy spray I once bought in junior high. It settles to a feminine sugar, this is perfect for summer days.

It smells like an elevated version of one of their summer scents. It has good staying power but could potentially be a little too sweet for some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky when it comes to fragrances because some of them just are overpowering and tend to give me a headache. Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum is simply delicious. It has a sweet note that comes from vanilla and cotton candy. I also get a calming feeling when I smell the coconut milk. I love that it's cruelty-free and contains organic sugar cane. This is super delicious! I like that it can br layered with other scents. Definitely recommend it especially to those who have like sweet scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar boardwalk delight smells just like cotton candy. It lasts a long time. I really enjoyed there vanilla sky scent and couldn't wait to try this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells wonderful!  I love that it is light and has a super clean scent.  It is not overly fragranced, which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I absolutely LOVE sweet scents! I've tried a lot of different body sprays and perfumes over 20 years; from lower priced scents like Body Fantasies Cotton Candy, to higher priced scents like Viva La Juicy Noir and Prada Candy Kiss. While all of these were great, I feel like I'm always looking for something else. Well, I think I found it with the SKYLAR Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum. The main fragrances are Pure Vanilla, Cotton Candy, & Coconut Milk, but all I smell is the absolute perfection of a light cotton candy scent. It's not a heavy scent, but if I roll it on my neck and wrists in the morning, I STILL smell it before bed, which is rare! Unless you're standing very close to someone, or giving a hug, I don't think others will notice the scent very much since it is a bit light; so it depends on how strong you like your scent to be! If you like sweet scents too, I'd highly recommend Boardwalk Delight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Skylar rollerball in scent boardwalk delight and I was pleasantly surprised with the scent. I was worried it would be too adolescent but itu2019s actually a lovely combination of cotton candy and vanilla. Unfortunately I feel the scent fades too quickly for me to justify the cost. I think it would be a good purchase for a young adult just starting to play around with scents.

reviews.review_title: Recommend if you love super sweet scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar's Boardwalk Delight Rollerball initially smells like a mix of creamy notes and strawberry candy, which translates as a strawberry milk scent. The dry down scent is a mix of warm and creamy notes (which translates as a saltwater taffy scent) and syrupy sweet notes (which translates as a cotton candy scent.) When I apply this perfume liberally on my neck, I can smell it clearly hours later. It's neither one dimensional (think vanilla body spray), nor overly intricate, like designer perfume. It's a lovely, comforting scent since it captures the essence of a few yummy sweet treats that we know and love perfectly.

blind bought this and fell in love. id say itu2019s a safe blind buy if the notes sound like theyu2019d be your thing. itu2019s a beautiful combination of sweet + clean/fresh. itu2019s not juvenile either. performance isnu2019t bad either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

I was a little hesitant to try it at first, but then I was very pleasantly surprised. It has a light and very delightful sent that is so pleasant and not overpowering. The scent last all day long and a little goes a long way. It might seem a little on the expensive side, but it is well worth the price, as it will last for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this fragrance! Since my fiancee and I have had COVID most of my fav. fragrances I can no longer wear so it was unbelievably wonderful to find a fragrance we both love and this is the one!
I really love this scent, the best way I can describe it is the strawberry shortcake toy I had as a kid. Scent lasts about half a day which is fine for me but others might want longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

Thought this would be similar to BBW Cotton Candy Clouds and this is no way close to it at all.Itu2019s smells weird to me.In all honesty I donu2019t what Iu2019m smelling but it not good!!

Boardwalk delight smells like cotton candy and soft laundry or like a dryer sheet. Itu2019s really pretty, soft and light scent. Perfect for summer mornings/running errands

reviews.review_title: Absolutely love, roller is very convenient!

The scent lasts but isn't overbearing which is a major plus. I love that this product is made with organic and vegan ingredients. It makes it an easy to want to purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Smells like Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Extreme
reviews.review_text: I love a good vanilla scent and was soooo looking forward to this coming back in stock. This to me smells so much like Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Extreme! I love both fragrance and so glad to see the scent stays on my skin ud83dudda4

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this perfume to try. It is a very nice and I enjoyed the sample. I enjoy the scent as it is pleasant. It is a little strong, but if I only use a little the smell is not unbearable. This will also let me use if for a long time.

reviews.review_title: Hubby loves when I wear this!!!

reviews.review_text: This scent stays on all day and there is no need to re-apply. I'd recommend Skylar Boardwalk Delight Eau De Parfum if you're into sweet scents! The cotton candy profile is strong at first, but once dried it tapers down. To my surprise also it didn't smell stale after a long day. I look forward to trying the other scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

On the skin, it warms up even more and the vanilla really shines. It even works well when layering other scents. The packaging of the roller ball is simple and sleek and is perfect to take along with you to the beach or boardwalk for a beautiful warm weather day. Iu2019m also impressed that this is a completely hypoallergenic vegan fragrance that is eco-friendly and safe for sensitive skin! I recommend to anyone looking for a sweet but balanced scent, perfect for summer! Even if you donu2019t typically like sweet sIt makes you want to go outside and enjoy life! reviews.review_text: Nice sweet spring scent. I really love the cotton candy note in it! Itu2019s not overly sweet and doesnu2019t go childish which is hard to do with that note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried the rollerball version of this perfume. Itu2019s a sweet smell, which my daughter liked and used often. However, I prefer a lighter scent, or something that smells more fresh. The size is nice because it fits in a purse/wristlet easily and the scent lasted about 4 hours before wearing off and needed reapplying. Overall I think this is a good product, really just depends on the scent you prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This parfume is great it smells so delicious and it lasts all day I got so many compliments on my parfume I told everyone it was Skylar Boardwalk Parfume this is now my favorite scent I wear it every day I highly recommend it so please try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!! It's now my favorite scent.. it is light and airy. The perfect summer perfume! The scent is a boardwalk meets the ocean scent! Cotton Candy and Ocean Air! LOVE! The bottle is so pretty too and such a beautiful color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the travel size of SKYLAR Boardwalk Delight. The smell is very close to something another perfume store sells so it definitely brought me back to that. The scent is nice but it just doesnu2019t last long. You think the scent would last a lot longer than it does considering the price. Iu2019ll probably end up keeping this in my purse or travel bag instead of daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical in trying this scent due to the vanilla scent but ended up really liking this. What I love the most is that the scent stays and it doesn't go away like other perfumes. I put some behind my ears and my wrist and smell good all day.

reviews.review_title: No cotton candy scent on me
reviews.review_text: Smells more like a fresh linen on me which is disappointing. I wanted to smell sweet like cotton candy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent. As soon as I apply this I can definitely smell the vanilla. Within a few hours it smells sweet and exactly like cotton candy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually got the SKYLAR BOARDWALK DELIGHT EAU DE PARFUM ROLLERBALL and loved it. The scent was very pleasant and the size was great for carrying in my purse. My husband liked the scent as well. The rollerball was great for easy of application and location of application. I would recommend this.
This smells fresh and amazing for the first 3 minutes, but once it dries down it smells like Baby Soft from the 80's.  Disappointed with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this fragrance for 2 weeks and I'm falling in love with it.  It's a great fragrance for that Spring/summer  scent. Not to heavy and lasts for a long time. I definitely will be buy more. Really love the vanilla  cotton candy

Way too sweet, if youu2019re into extremely sweet scents then youu2019ll probably like it. It smells similar to pastel skies from bath and body works just without the red berry scent. Personally made me nauseous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The SKYLAR Clean Beauty Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum smells nice. It has a sweet vanilla and cotton candy scent. After using this perfume I could still smell it on me for many hours. I love that this perfume is safe for sensitive skin, Hypoallergenic and Eco-Friendly. My daughter loves the cotton candy scent of the SKYLAR Boardwalk Delight perfume. This perfume would be a great gift for anyone who likes sweet Summer scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent from Skylar!! I don't usually like the roller ball application for perfume. I would prefer a spray. But this stuff smells absolutely delicious! Vanilla and coconut and I don't know what but it smells great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this roll on so much. I wanna lick myself lol. It smells like cotton candy and has nice soft notes behind it. The scent changes throughout the day but is still nice at the end of the day. Def a re purchase item

reviews.review_title: Smells nice in the bottle, but not on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this fragrance, but it did not smell good on me. In the bottle, it has a really nice candy type smell, but on me, it initially smelled like a child's perfume (something a 12 year old girl would probably love), but I still had hope, so I let it dry down. Well, that's when it got nasty. I guess it did not mix well with my body chemistry and it sort of took on a hot plastic smell. I'm not sure how else to describe it - just imagine the smell of a soft plastic doll that has been left out in the hot sun all day. It definitely has some staying power because I tried to wash it off and I could still smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much! I can only describe it as Cotton Candy for Grown Ups. However, my daughter keeps stealing it. We both love this scent so much. Skylar is my new favorite. So far, I haven't come across one I don't like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SKYLAR is pure cotton candy in a fragrance. I have been wearing it everyday since I got it, I'm addicted! It's sweet, but yet still soft and lasts all day long. The fragrance notes are Pure Vanilla, Cotton Candy, and Coconut Milk, but it really does smell like fresh Cotton Candy. The first ingredient is Organic Sugar Cane alcohol. If you love sweet, candy-like scents this is a must. I've already gone through half the roller. I will definitely be getting more soon!

I had no idea of what to expect with this scent, but after trying it a couple of times, I can't wear it. Way too sweet for me and I felt like I had cotton candy all around me. I think this scent will appeal to a much younger group , but this is definitely not for me. I found that a little goes a long way , so it can be perfect for someone who likes the scent, but not great for one who doesn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this perfume the last week or so and I like the light airy scent and I feel that I can wear it to work and not have it be overbearing.  The fragrance notes are vanilla, cotton candy and coconut milk.  I asked my husband what he thought of it as he is particular on scents.  He said he thought it smelled like cotton candy (without me even telling him that was one of the fragrance notes) and he liked it.  I like the roller ball because I can carry it in my purse.
